articles.title: Emergency calls reveal growing desperation before South Korea Halloween crush - Reuters.com
articles.description: Transcripts of the 11 emergency calls made in the hours and minutes before a Halloween party crush killed more than 150 people in Seoul reveal the growing fear of revellers and how they had urged the police to intervene.
